title: Is there an Icon for beating Doom Bots level 100?
body: I've been hearing there was but i want confirmation

replies.body: I don't believe there are any extra icons beyond the rewards already [announced](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/the-teemoing-2016).  Still, congrats if you beat that!

there should definitely be something special for beating it on the hardest difficulty. can you guys at least discuss this with each other and consider it? very few people are successful at beating it at level 100.

Do you know why? They announced it on the PBE, and then said in twitter they weren't going to do it. I feel that an icon for lvl 100 doom bots would be really cool and an awesome conversation starter for years to come.
There's no reason why someone who beat doom bots LV1 would get the same rewards as someone who beats doom bots LV100.. it makes no sens
How about it's a game, it's all for fun, and you don't need special recognition for everything you do?

> [{quoted}](name=Shapeshifter,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=TbG9kTWI,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-10-28T03:39:25.349+0000)
>
> How about it's a game, it's all for fun, and you don't need special recognition for everything you do?

Then do they just remove ranked?
Yeah... we spent 7 hours to beat lvl 100. Feels just bad it won't reward us anything
wtf I just beat it on my first try it was so easy
I cant even beat doom bots at 50. ezreal is so painful
